channel.title: Projects on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Home

item.title: Amazon rainforest
item.description: Read it on medium See full project in GitHub’s repository Deforestation data The data examined in this study is from Terrabrasilis — Plataforma de dados geográficos — INPE. It is the Brazilian government organization that supervise the Amazon rainforest area. Here, the focus is going to be on deforestation data throughout the years 2008 to 2019 Counties: the ground for analysis The first step is to situate the geospacial deforestation data into the basis for our analysis: Legal Amazon counties.

item.title: Client churn prediction
item.description: See full project in GitHub’s repository Disclaimer: this is a fictional business case The company is a bank that operates primarily in Europe. Their main product is a bank account. Owning this account doesn’t have any cost in the first 12 months However, the client needs to rehire the bank for the upcoming 12 months after the free trial expires as well as everytime this new 12 months hired also expires
